title: Southern Poison
description: Ace Dalton is the middle son, the black sheep of the family. Drinking, women, gambling—welcome to Ace’s world.Until dear old dad cuts off Ace’s credit cards and forces him to work at the family distillery, insisting that it’s time for Ace to grow up.But whiskey isn’t the only thing brewing at Dalton Enterprises when an environmental agency files a class action lawsuit, forcing them to cease and desist production. Meanwhile, Ace falls for the one woman in Nashville, Tennessee who doesn’t want him—Callie Harrison.Can he win her over and save the family business or will the pressure be too hot for Ace to handle?
author: Shauna Jared
